P3 Training Program

Spinning Attacks, Strikes and Kicks

  • Syllabus
  • Discussion
  • Additional Videos

Official KMG P1 Training Syllabus

Improving trainees abilities to prevent and release from different grabs Striving to the Fighter Level. Emphasizing on finishing modes and continuation to the Fighter Level. Improving trainees abilities to prevent and release.

A. Spinning Attacks, Strikes and Kicks
  1. Spinning back elbow (horizontal)
  2. Spinning back hammer strike (horizontal)
  3. Spinning defensive back kick. Including series and combinations.
  4. Spinning regular back kick.

Notes & Extra Curriculum

A. Spinning Attacks, Strikes and Kicks
  1. Spinning back elbow (horizontal)
  2. Spinning back hammer strike (horizontal)
  3. Spinning defensive back kick. Including series and combinations.
  4. Spinning regular back kick.
A. Spinning Attacks, Strikes and Kicks
  1. Spinning back elbow (horizontal)
  2. Spinning back hammer strike (horizontal)
  3. Spinning defensive back kick. Including series and combinations.
  4. Spinning regular back kick.
